title: Person of Interest - Soundtrack Judgment
author: dartell1996
comment: Oh finally İ found this song thank god
This was used at the end of the "Judgment" episode, when the POI and his son play soccer and Reese and Finch have a breakfast conversation.
judgment episode is one of the best episodes.Specially ending of that episode was too good. Person of interest episodes final scenes are best final scenes on the world.
I really enjoyed the ending of that episode
Its crazy how this song can be so beautiful and so sad at the same time!! I love the song and the show my mom got me hooked!!!
description: The awesome soundtrack of Person of Interest
